product_overview: PrismaTech Aula Management System is a comprehensive educational management platform designed for PrismaTech Code Academy. It facilitates class scheduling, user authentication, course and module management, attendance tracking, and task administration all via a modern web interface backed by robust APIs using Node.js, Express, and Prisma with PostgreSQL.
core_goals: Provide secure user authentication and user data management to control access.
Enable streamlined scheduling and management of classes, including attendance and content delivered.
Support course and module creation to organize educational offerings efficiently.
Manage multiple class groups (turmas) with CRUD operations to keep organizational data updated.
Track and administer extra non-academic tasks to monitor task completion status.
key_features: User Authentication & Management with login, registration, and profile retrieval endpoints.
Comprehensive Schedule API allowing retrieval, import, status update for attendance, and content registration per lesson.
Classes (Turmas) API facilitating creation, listing, updating, and deletion of class groups.
Courses and Modules API enabling course listing, creation, and module addition to courses.
Extra Tasks API for managing non-lesson tasks with creation, listing, and completion marking.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in to the system, obtaining authentication via JWT tokens.
Authenticated users access their dashboard to view scheduled classes and relevant course information.
Admins or educators import or create schedules, mark class attendance, and record content taught per session.
Admins create and manage courses and modules, organizing educational content into logical groupings.
Users create, list, and complete extra tasks that fall outside the typical lesson schedule.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and login with JWT-based session management.
Ability to create, list, modify, and delete classes, courses, modules, and tasks through API endpoints.
Schedules can be imported and attendance/content status updated reliably and reflected correctly in the system.
APIs must return correct HTTP status codes and respond appropriately to valid and invalid requests.
The system must persist all data accurately in PostgreSQL via Prisma ORM and reflect changes instantaneously.
